results.name: Rectangular array read by antidiagonals: a(m,n) = 2 * Integral_{t>=0} T_n((t+m)/2)*exp(-t)*dt, m>=0, n>=0, where T_n(x) is n-th Chebyshev polynomial of first kind.
comment: a(m,n) is a polynomial in m of degree n.
For any integers m>=0, n>=0, 2 * Integral_{t=-m..m} T_n(t/2)*exp(-t)*dt = 4 * Integral_{z=-m/2..m/2} T_n(z)*exp(-2*z)*dz = A300481(m,n)*exp(m) - a(m,n)*exp(-m).
xref: Values for m<=0 are given in A300481.
